title: Shell Sort for UDInt Arrays
name: LGF_ShellSort_UDInt
description: This block sorts an array of type UDInt with any number of elements (max. 1000) in ascending or descending order and returns the sorted version of the array in the same variable.

input.name: sortDirection
input.description: FALSE: Sort ascending; TRUE: Sort descending

output.name: error
output.description: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB, Error identification
